channel.title: Ranking xp
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Ranking xp" - How does it work?

item.title: Re: Ranking xp
item.content:encoded:
Thing which increases Ranking:

  • Base Ranking is equal to base Jutsu XP/base AP on missions
  • Arena Favorite - +15% Ranking
  • Note Rush (bingo with The Note) - +20% Ranking
  • Late-Night Snack - +100,000 Ranking XP per day
  • Silver Elixir (Potion: 50 Appetite): +100,000 Ranking per Potion
  • Party Room (Party House game) - Party for Ranking XP and Friend Points
  • Catgirl Entourage - Doubles the Ranking XP of Parties in Party Room
  • Perfect Girl Evolution: Loli Loli - +1 Range, -25 Stamina, +100% Party Bonuses

item.title: Ranking xp
item.content:encoded: It has been a long time since I have had the need to collect ranking. Now i wonder what affects ranking?
